channel.title: Leaflet on An analysis of random things
channel.description: Recent content in Leaflet on An analysis of random things

item.title: Location search using Factual and interactive maps using Leaflet
item.description: The code for this project has been uploaded to [github](https://github.com/Runze/factual). Leaflet is a popular javascript library for making interactive maps. Don’t know how to code in js? No problem, thanks to Ramnath Vaidyanathan, you can now use rCharts to do it in R! Now that we have R Shiny, it just seems a natural thing to combine the two together to make Shiny apps for interactive maps. If that doesn’t motivate you, take a look at these cool examples and roll up your sleeves and make one yourself (example1, example2)!
